jd: From: Chaitanya, RuriSoft LLC chaitanya@rurisoft.com Reply to: chaitanya@rurisoft.com GEOSPATIAL SR. DEVELOPER JAVAClient Address: 2 PNC Building 620 Liberty Avenue, Pittsburgh, PA - 15222ONSITE ROLEJob Description:We are seeking a highly skilled Sr. Developer with expertise in Java API and Spring Boot to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have 8 to 12 years of experience in developing and implementing geospatial solutions. This role involves working on cutting-edge projects that leverage geospatial data to drive business insights and improve decision-making processes.Develop and implement geospatial solutions using Java and Spring Boot to meet project requirements. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and develop scalable geospatial applications. - Provide technical expertise in Java Platform APIs to enhance the functionality of geospatial systems. - Oversee the integration of geospatial data with existing systems and databases. - Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of geospatial applications. - Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members. - Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues related to geospatial applications. - Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in geospatial development. - Contribute to the continuous improvement of development processes and methodologies. - Mentor junior developers and provide guidance on best practices in geospatial development. - Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements for geospatial projects. - Develop and maintain documentation for geospatial applications and processes. - Participate in project planning and provide estimates for development tasks.Top 3 Skills Required:JavaSpring BootJava Platform APIsYears of experience: 8-12 years
